channel.title: Omg please someone help!
channel.description: Im playing my friends downloaded client everyone on it is playing no problem with them but when i run it and log in it works but then i start walking around and then the client automaticaly shuts down and exit! why is that :( its only happening to me i updated java and everything someone help please :(

u dont have msn? hotmail?

item.title: Omg please someone help!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Your client shuts down when you kill something?
Your client shuts down after you click a couple times?
Your client shuts down after a random amount of time?

I don’t know which of these are true…If it is the 2nd or 3rd option, I’m not sure on how to help you. It probably is a problem with your source (might not be very well coded ~ many flaws ~ ). Otherwise if it is the middle choice, what I told you SHOULD work. I have helped out quite a few people with the same problem as you.

If you truly wish to use teamviewer, I’m rather bored right now so you can send me the password and the Ip.Through a Pm on here. I have ventrilo and trilian, If you wish to talk, you can use one of those.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg please someone help!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I have windows vista so I’m not sure where you can uninstall programs. So I’m doing this blindfolded.

Go to Start Menu -> Control Panel -> Programs -> Programs and Features -> Then scroll until you see Java ™ SE Development Kit 6 Update 21 -> Right click that and uninstall.

If that doesn’t work for windows 7…well…explore around with a bit. Until you find a list of your programs.

Now in order to download Java 32 bit version go here:

https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u21-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer

You see the drop-down menu for platforms? Select Windows and download.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg please someone help!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

…You have windows 7 64 bit right?

If so I’m assuming that you downloaded the JDK version (64bit) ---- Uninstall that.
Go back to the Java website and Install the JDK version (32bit) ---- You will be able to walk around now without the client crashing.

Read full topic
